required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect of Multiple Dosing With BI 201335 on CYP2B6 Metabolism and Effect of Multiple Dosing With Efavirenz on the Steady-state Pharmacokinetics of BI 201335 and on CYP3A4/5 Metabolism in Healthy Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Effect of Multiple Dosing With 240mg q 12hrs BI 201335 on the Pharmacokinetics of 50 mg Single Dose Efavirenz and Effect of Multiple Dosing With 600mg QD Efavirenz on Cyp 3A4 and the Pharmacokinetics of BI 201335 in Healthy Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock:
Obtain interaction data between BI 201335 and Efavirenz to guide dosing for each drug when administered together.
To predict drug interaction between BI 201335 and Cyp 3A4 y using Midazolam as cyp 3A4 probe , Efavirenz as enzyme inducer and BI 201335 as enzyme inhibitor.

primary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of Efavirenz calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval 0 to infinity of Efavirenz calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)

primary_outcome.time_frame: 0:00, 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 12:00 h after first administration of Faldaprevir
primary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma concentration at steady state of Faldaprevir calculated for subjects in sequence group B (600 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Faldaprevir+7.5 mg Midazolam)

secondary_outcome.description: Maximum plasma concentration of Faldaprevir on day 14 at steady state, calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
Time of maximum concentration of Faldaprevir on day 14 at steady state, calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)

Time of maximum concentration of Efavirenz on day 14, calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
Time of maximum concentration of Faldaprevir on Day 9 and 10 at steady state, calculated for patients in sequence group B (600 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Faldaprevir+7.5 mg Midazolam)

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinical Relevant Abnormalities for Vital Signs, Blood Chemistry, Haematology, Physical Examination and ECG
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From first treatment administration (Day 1) up to Day 24
secondary_outcome.description: Clinical Relevant Abnormalities for Vital Signs, Blood Chemistry, Haematology, Physical Examination and ECG. New abnormal findings or worsening of baseline conditions were reported as Adverse Events.

secondary_outcome.measure: Group A - Number of Participants With Drug Related Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 30 days after last treatment (Days 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,11,13,14,15,16,17,18,19,20,24)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with investigator-defined drug related adverse events (AE) in sequence group A. AEs occurring up to 5 days after last intake of Faldaprevir on day 19 were assigned to Efavirenz+Faldaprevir treatment. AEs were assessed throughout the trial. During the outpatient portion of the trial, assessment of AEs was monitored by telephone.

secondary_outcome.measure: Group B - Number of Participants With Drug Related Adverse Events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From Day 1 up to 30 days after last treatment (Days 1,2,6,8,9,10,11,14,17,18,19,24)
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with investigator-defined drug related adverse events (AE) in sequence group B. AEs occurring up to 5 days after last intake of Faldaprevir were assigned to Faldaprevir+Midazolam+Efavirenz treatment. AEs were assessed throughout the trial. During the outpatient portion of the trial, assessment of AEs was monitored by telephone.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
Healthy volunteers age 18- 55 BMI (Body Mass Index) 18.5 - 29.9
Exclusion criteria:
1. Any finding on medical examination and ECG (Electrocardiography) deviating from normal
2. Active diseases
3. History of photosensitivity or rash

group.title: Group A: 240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz
group.description: Faldaprevir (soft gel capsule): Loading dose (480 mg) on day 7 followed by 240 mg doses twice a day until day 19. Efavirenz (film-coated tablet): Single dose (50 mg) on day 1 and 14. oral administration with water after food intake.

group.title: Group B: 600 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Faldaprevir+7.5 mg Midazolam
group.description: Faldaprevir (soft gel capsule): Loading dose (480 mg) on day 2 followed by 240 mg doses twice a day until day 18. Efavirenz (film-coated tablet): 600 mg on days 10 to 18 once a day. Midazolam (tablet): Single dose (7.5 mg) on day 1, 9 and 18. oral administration with water after food intake.

group.title: Group A: 240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz
group.description: Faldaprevir (soft gel capsule): Loading dose (480 mg) on day 7 followed by 240 mg doses twice a day until day 19. Efavirenz (film-coated tablet): Single dose (50 mg) on day 1 and 14. oral administration with water after food intake.

group.title: Group B: 600 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Feldaprevir+7.5 mg Midazolam
group.description: Faldaprevir (soft gel capsule): Loading dose (480 mg) on day 2 followed by 240 mg doses twice a day until day 18. Efavirenz (film-coated tablet): 600 mg on days 10 to 18 once a day. Midazolam (tablet): Single dose (7.5 mg) on day 1, 9 and 18. oral administration with water after food intake.

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

outcome.title: Group A - Efavirenz: Cmax
outcome.description: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of Efavirenz calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
outcome.population: all subjects entered in sequence group A of the PK set. Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: This subject set included all subjects of the treated set who provided evaluable data for at least1 observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in any trial period without important protocol violations.

group.title: 50 mg Efavirenz
group.description: single oral administration of 50 mg Efavirenz dosed alone (Day 1)

group.title: 50 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Faldaprevir
group.description: single oral administration of 50 mg Efavirenz dosed with Faldaprevir at steady state (Day 14)

measure.title: Group A - Efavirenz: Cmax
measure.description: Maximum plasma concentration (Cmax) of Efavirenz calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
measure.population: all subjects entered in sequence group A of the PK set. Pharmacokinetic (PK) set: This subject set included all subjects of the treated set who provided evaluable data for at least1 observation for at least 1 primary PK endpoint in any trial period without important protocol violations.

analysis.groups_desc: relative bioavailability comparison (50 mg Efavirenz+240 mg Faldaprevir : 50 mg Efavirenz) of Efavirenz
analysis.non_inferiority_desc: investigation of relative bioavailability (no formal testing)
analysis.estimate_desc: the standard deviation is actually the geometric coefficient of variation

outcome.title: Group A - Efavirenz: AUC0-∞
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of the analyte in plasma over the time interval 0 to infinity of Efavirenz calculated for subjects in sequence group A (240 mg Faldaprevir+50 mg Efavirenz)
outcome.population: all subjects entered in sequence group A of the PK set.

measure.title: Group B - Number of Participants With Drug Related Adverse Events
measure.description: Number of participants with investigator-defined drug related adverse events (AE) in sequence group B. AEs occurring up to 5 days after last intake of Faldaprevir were assigned to Faldaprevir+Midazolam+Efavirenz treatment. AEs were assessed throughout the trial. During the outpatient portion of the trial, assessment of AEs was monitored by telephone.
measure.population: all subjects entered in sequence group B of the treated set.

reported_events.desc: AEs were assessed throughout the trial. During the outpatient portion of the trial, assessment of AEs was monitored by telephone.

group.title: Group A: Efavirenz
group.description: Treatment with single-dose Efavirenz in Group A.

group.title: Group A: Faldaprevir
group.description: During treatment with Faldaprevir in Group A.

group.title: Group A: Faldaprevir+Efavirenz
group.description: During treatment with Faldaprevir and single-dose Efavirenz in Group A.

group.title: Group B: Midazolam
group.description: Treatment with single-dose Midazolam in Group B.

group.title: Group B: Faldaprevir
group.description: During treatment with Faldaprevir in Group B.

group.title: Group B: Faldaprevir+Midazolam
group.description: During treatment with Faldaprevir and single-dose Midazolam in Group B.

group.title: Group B: Faldaprevir+Midazolam+Efavirenz
group.description: During treatment with Faldaprevir, Efavirenz, and single-dose Midazolam in Group B.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Boehringer Ingelheim (BI) acknowledges that investigators have the right to publish the study results. Investigators shall provide BI with a copy of any publication or presentation for review prior to any submission. Such review will be done with regard to proprietary information, information related to patentable inventions, medical, scientific, and statistical accuracy within 60 days. BI may request a delay of the publication in order to protect BI’s intellectual property rights.
